entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:09 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
